hero.title: Time's Up! Bike Co-op
hero.tagline:
A volunteer-run space in the East Village for accessible bicycle repair.  Learn how to fix your bike or just chit chat about it.  Beginner friendly, no experience needed.
This co-op is an environmental initiative under [Time's Up org](https://times-up.org/)

howItWorks.heading: How It Works?
howItWorks.text: Bring your bike and describe the issue to a volunteer mechanic. They will provide the tools and guidance but you will be hands on for the repair. Suggested $2 donation covers tool use and supplies. We also sell used parts onsite ([parts pricing)](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGpoE5WunE/sd7Tocqw9nuRl_IhE9WkWA/view?utm_content=DAGpoE5WunE&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=uniquelinks&utlId=hacf7432243)

helpfulTips.heading: Helpful Tips
helpfulTips.tips:
- Come early. Fixing one problem sometimes reveals another
- No new projects 30 minutes before closing
- No e-bike servicing
- Check our [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/times_up_nyc/) for holiday hours, inclement weather closings and special events

images.alt: Volunteers welcome regardless of mechanical skill. We have plenty to do from sales, web design to general organizing
